name: Overthinking
description:
Slavic Game Jam 2019. Theme: GROWTH.

Just do not overthink it :P Anger and Joy are fighting inside your head and only one of them can be victorious. Let's find out which one.

Graphics: Myriam, Yu Andriichuk

Sounds: Myriam, Narek

Developers: Ayk, Alain, DeathTost

Controls: Keyboard (First Player: WSAD for movement and R/F for shooting Second Player:Arrow Keys for movement and M/P for shooting), Controller (Left stick for movement, Right stick for aim, LB1 red bullets, RB1 blue bullets) 

The goal of the game is to push your opponent from the ring or make him explode!
